3.label: Over current protection
3.description: Output Load will be turned off automatically after 30 seconds and if the current overrun 1.5A.

4.label: Over heat protection
4.description: Output load will be closed after 30 seconds if the temperature inside the product exceeds 100C.

20.label: Status re-power on
20.description: Configure the output load status after re-power on

options.label: The last status before the power outage

21.label: WallSwipe IR sensor
21.description:
Enable/disable the IR sensor of WallSwipe.
				(LSB) Value 1.
				Value 1 = 0, disable the IR Sensor.
				Value 1 = 1, enable the IR Sensor.
				Value 2 = 0, Wave Option 1 is selected.
				Value 2 = 1, Wave Option 2 is selected.
				Value 3 = 0, disable the scene control functionality for Left/Right wave.
				Value 3 = 1, enable the scene control functionality for Left/Right wave
				Value 4 = 0, disable the scene control functionality for all wave actions.
				Value 4 = 1, enable the scene control functionality for all wave actions.

64.label: WallSwipe button color
64.description:
Set the button color of WallSwipe.
				Value 1= Level.
				Value 2= the color value of Red.
				Value 3= the color value of Green.
				Value 4= the color value of Blue.

65.label: WallSwipe LED Up gesture action
65.description:
Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when the gesture action is UP.
				Value 1= Reserved.
				Value 2= the color value of Red.
				Value 3= the color value of Green.
				Value 4= the color value of Blue.

66.label: WallSwipe LED Down gesture action
66.description:
Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when the gesture action is Down.
				Value 1= Level.
				Value 2= the color value of Red.
				Value 3= the color value of Green.
				Value 4= the color value of Blue.

67.label: WallSwipe LED Left gesture action
67.description:
Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when the gesture action is Left.
				Value 1= Level.
				Value 2= the color value of Red.
				Value 3= the color value of Green.
				Value 4= the color value of Blue.

68.label: WallSwipe LED Right gesture action
68.description:
Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when the gesture action is Right.
				Value 1= Level.
				Value 2= the color value of Red.
				Value 3= the color value of Green.
				Value 4= the color value of Blue.

69.label: WallSwipe Night light
69.description:
Set the LED indication color of WallSwipe when it is in Night light state.
				Value 1= Level.
				Value 2= the color value of Red.
				Value 3= the color value of Green.
				Value 4= the color value of Blue.

80.label: Notification report association group 1
80.description: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 1 when the state of output load is changed

options.label: Send Hail CC when using the manual switch to change the load state

81.label: Notification report using the external switch 1
81.description: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 3 when using the external switch 1 to switch the loads

82.label: Notification report using the external switch 2
82.description: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 4 when using the external switch 2 to switch the loads

83.label: LED status
83.description: Configure the state of LED when it is in 3 modes below

options.label: The LED will follow the status
LED will follow the status (on/off) of its load but the LED will turn off after 5 seconds

84.label: Time set for Night light mode
84.description:
Value1: Hour of ON.
				Value2: Minute of ON.
				Value3: Hour of OFF.
				Value4: Minute of OFF.
				E.g. The default setting is the Night light mode is enabled at 12: 00 and disabled at 8:00 0x12000800.

85.label: State appointment 1
85.description:
State appointment
                Set the ON time of output load.
                Value1 = 0, disable or = non zero, enable (day, bit0 - bit6 represent Mon to Sun).
                Value2 = ON (hour)
                Value3 = ON (minute)
                Value4 = ON (brightness level)

86.label: State appointment 2
86.description:
State appointment
                Set the ON time of output load.
                Value1 = 0, disable or = non zero, enable (day, bit0 - bit6 represent Mon to Sun).
                Value2 = ON (hour)
                Value3 = ON (minute)
                Value4 = ON (brightness level)

91.label: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
91.description: The value represents the minimum change in wattage for a Report to be sent (default 25 W)

92.label: Minimum Change to send Report (%)
92.description: The value represents the minimum percentage change in wattage for a Report to be sent (Default 5)

100.label: Default Group Reports
100.description: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

101.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1
101.description:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1.
                1 is meter report for voltage.
                2 is meter report for current.
                4 is meter report for watts.
                8 is meter report for kilowatts.
                Value 1 (msb) Reserved
                Value 2 Reserved
                Value 3 Reserved
                Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                bit 3 kWh
                bit 2 watt
                bit 1 current
                bit 0 voltage

102.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2
102.description:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2.
                1 is meter report for voltage.
                2 is meter report for current.
                4 is meter report for watts.
                8 is meter report for kilowatts.
                Value 1 (msb) Reserved
                Value 2 Reserved
                Value 3 Reserved
                Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                bit 3 kWh
                bit 2 watt
                bit 1 current
                bit 0 voltage

103.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3
103.description:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3.
                1 is meter report for voltage.
                2 is meter report for current.
                4 is meter report for watts.
                8 is meter report for kilowatts.
                Value 1 (msb) Reserved
                Value 2 Reserved
                Value 3 Reserved
                Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                bit 3 kWh
                bit 2 watt
                bit 1 current
                bit 0 voltage

110.label: Set 111-113 to default
110.description: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

111.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1
111.description: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

112.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2
112.description: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

113.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
113.description: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.

120.label: Set the external switch mode for S1
120.description: When the mode is determined, this mode value will not be reset after exclusion

121.label: Set the external switch mode for S2
121.description: When the mode is determined, this mode value will not be reset after exclusion

122.label: WallSwipe
122.description: Get the state of touch panel port

123.label: Control destination for external switch S1
123.description: Set the control destination for external switch S1

options.label: Output loads of itself and other nodes

124.label: Control destination for external switch S2
124.description: Set the control destination for external switch S2

options.label: Output loads of itself and other nodes

130.label: Type of load
130.description: To get what type of load the Dimmer is connected to

131.label: Min brightness level
131.description: Set the min brightness level that the load can reach to

132.label: Max brightness level
132.description: Set the max brightness level that the load can reach to

247.label: Working way for S1/S2
247.description:
Set the working way for S1/S2 when the Switch mode is 2 state switch mode.
                Bit 0 =0, S1 is a toggle switch.
                Bit 0 =1, S1 is an On/Off switch, the out load state and S1 switch state would be in sync when using S1 to control the output load.
                Bit 1 =0, S2 is a toggle switch.
                Bit 1 =1, S2 is an On/Off switch, the out load state and S2 switch state would be in sync when using S2 to control the output load.
                Bit 2- Bit 7, reserved.

248.label: Function of S1/S2
248.description:
Set the function of S1/S2.
                Bit 0 = 0, the function of sending NIF is disabled.
                Bit 0 = 1, the function of sending NIF is enabled.
                Bit 1 = 0, the function of entering RF power level test mode is disabled.
                Bit 1 = 1, the function of entering RF power level test mode is enabled.
                Bit 2 = 0, the function of factory reset is disabled.
                Bit 2 = 1, the function of factory reset is enabled.
                Bit 3- Bit 6 = reserved.
                Bit 7 = 0, the setting for Bit 0 -Bit 2 are ineffective.
                Bit 7 = 1, the setting for Bit 0 -Bit 2 are effective.

249.label: Recognition way of load
249.description: Set the recognition way of load

options.label: Never recognize the load when power on
Only recognize once when first power on
Recognize the load once power on
Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network
